text: Ramón Mejía (born 31 August 1943) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Baja California Sur Category:People from Mulegé Municipality
title: Ramón Mejía
